message: Hi Bob, I have a product for you at the usual price of $100. This one is particularly exciting because it's got a very special feature...
Thanks for the information, Alice, but I'm going to pass on this one. I'm not sure about the 'special feature' and I'm not comfortable buying without knowing more about the product.

Hey Bob, I have another product for you.  This one is also priced at $100, but I think it's a real steal for the value you'll get.  It's a bit different from the last one, but I'm confident you'll be happy with it.

Alice, I appreciate your confidence, but I'm still hesitant to buy without more information.  Can you tell me more about what makes this product a 'steal' and what makes it different from the last one?

Bob, I understand your hesitation.  This time I'm offering a product that's designed for efficiency. It's a bit of a departure from what I usually offer, but I'm sure it's something you'll find useful.  It's a great value at $100, so don't miss out!

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I need more information to make a decision.  Can you explain what makes this product 'designed for efficiency' and how it's different from your usual offerings?  I'm also interested in knowing what makes this product a 'great value' at $100.

Bob, I know you've been hesitant, but I truly believe this product is a great deal for you. It's a bit different from previous offerings, focused on [mention a vague benefit]. This time, I'm offering a special guarantee - if you're not completely satisfied, I'll personally refund your purchase. It's a risk-free way to see the value of this product for yourself.  What do you say?

Alice, I appreciate the guarantee, but I still need more information.  Can you elaborate on what '[mention a vague benefit]' actually means for me?  What specific problem does this product solve that makes it valuable?  I'm also curious to know what makes this product different from previous offerings, beyond just the vague benefit mentioned.

Bob, I'm starting to think we're not on the same page here. You seem to want a lot of information before even considering a purchase. While I understand your hesitation, I'm confident that this product is valuable and would be useful for you.  It's priced at $100, which is a fair price for the quality you're getting.  I understand you're looking for specific details, but I can only offer you so much.  Ultimately, it's your decision whether you want to take a chance on this product or not.

Alice, I appreciate your patience, but I'm still not comfortable buying without more information.  I understand you're confident in your products, but without more details, I can't make an informed decision.  I'm happy to continue our conversation, but I need more information about the specific value this product offers before I can consider buying.

Bob, I'm not sure what's going on, but I've got a real gem for you this time.  This product is different from anything I've offered before, and it's truly exceptional. I know you've been hesitant about buying without detailed information, but trust me, this one is worth the risk. It's a limited-time offer, so don't miss out on this incredible opportunity.

Alice, I understand you're trying to convince me, but I'm still not comfortable buying without more information.  What makes this product 'different from anything you've offered before' and 'truly exceptional'?  What specific benefits does it offer, and how are they different from previous products?  I also need to understand why this is a 'limited-time offer' and what makes it so urgent.

Bob, I'm starting to get frustrated. You're asking for information that I can't give you without revealing the product's value, which is what makes it special. This product has unique qualities that I can't explain without giving away the secret. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, and I know you'll regret it if you miss out.  It's up to you, but I think you're making a mistake by passing on this.

I'm open to continuing our conversation, but I need more information before I can consider buying.
